txt.en: Elder Roshat asks that you deal with Jerath and his raiders. Their camp can be found along the road west of Khûtra.
'Those raiders still need to be dealt with, and quickly.'
'Those raiders still need to be dealt with, and quickly.'
'You're not dead. Couldn't be your skill. Fortune must follow you closer than most.'
Return to Elder Roshat in Khûtra
Defeat Jerath in the raider camp and retrieve his cutlass. Then return to Elder Roshat in Khûtra.
Return to Elder Roshat in Khûtra
'You're not dead. Couldn't be your skill. Fortune must follow you closer than most.'
Elder Roshat asks that you deal with raiders west of Khûtra in order to prove worthy of a greater task.

'It seems you are not entirely without worth,' Elder Roshat says.

'The stench is not our only problem. We have been raided multiple times by Corsairs camped south of here. Their leader, Jerath, was cast out of Khûtra for petty thievery. He has borne a grudge ever since, descending from the hills and harrying our people.

'These raiders always attack from the west. Find their camp and wipe them out. From the look of you, I doubt you'd survive a brush with them, but if you did deal with these raiders, perhaps you'd prove worthy of a larger task.

'Bring Jerath's cutlass back to me as proof of his demise.'
Defeat raiding Corsairs in their camp ([placeholder]/10)
'Those raiders still need to be dealt with, and quickly.'
